definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be saturated, drink one’s fill (NH in der. spec.; Ar. rawiya; Eth. rawaya: Aram. [[רְוִי]], rwo0);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. consec. [[וְרָוְֽתָּה]] [[מִדָּמָם]] Je 46:10, fig. of sword (‖[[שָֽׂבְעָה ]], [[אָֽכְלָה]]); Impf. 3 mpl. [[יִרְוְיֻן מִדֶּשֶׁן בֵּיתֶָךָ]] Ps 36:9 (Ges:§ 75 u) fig. of men (‖[[תַּשְׁקֵם ]]); 1 pl. [[נִרְוֶה דׂדִים]] Pr 7:18 we will take our fill of love (‖[[נִתְעַלְּסָה ]]).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[רִוְּתָה]] Is 34:5, ´[[וְר]]: consec. v:Is 34:7; 1 s. consec. [[וְרִוֵּיתִי]] Je 31:14; Impf. 1 s. sf. [[אֲרַיׇּ֫וֶךָ]] Is 16:9 (read prob. [[אֲרַוַּ֫יִח]] Margolis:Am. J. Sem. Lang., Oct. 1902, 48, vid. also Kö:i. 589 f.; > [[אֲרַוָּ֫יֶח]] Sta:§ 634 e Ges:§ 75 dd); 3 mpl. sf. [[יְרַוֻּךָ]] Pr 5:19; Inf. abs. [[רַוֵּה]] Ps 65:11 (Ges:§ 113 z);—
intens. be intoxicated, drunk Is 34:5, fig. of sword; + [[מִדָּם]] v:Is 34:7, of land (‖[[יְדֻשָָּׁן ]]).

causat., drench, water abundantly, c. acc. [[תְּלָמֶיהָ]] (subj. ´[[י]]:); Is 16:9 c. acc. pers. + [[דִּמְעָתִי]] material; saturate (fig.), sate, [[וֶפֶשׁ הַכּׂהֲנִים דָָּשֶׁן]] ´[[ור]]: Je 31:14 (‖[[שׂבע ]]); sexually, [[דַּדָּיהָ]] [[יְרַוֻּךָ]] Pr 5:19.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הִרְוָה]] Is 55:10, sf. [[הִרְוַנִי]] La 3:15; 2 ms. sf. [[הִרְוִיתָָנִי]] Is 43:24; 1 s. [[הִרְוֵיתִי]] Je 31:25; Pt. [[מַרְוֶה]] Pr 11:25;—saturate, water, c. acc. [[ארץ]] Is 55:10 (subj. [[שֶׁלֶנ]], [[גֶּשֶׁם]]); cause to drink (fig.), c. acc. pers. etrei ([[לַעֲנׇה]]) La 3:15 (‖[[הִשְׂבִּיעַנִי ]]); c. acc. pers. only ([[נֶפֶשׁ]]) Je 31:25 (‖[[מִלֵּאתִי ]]), abs. Pr 11:25; of Isr. satisfying ´[[י]]:, [[חֵלֶב זְבָחִים]] Is 43:24.
